title: Thermally Activated Non-Affine Rearrangements in Amorphous Glass: Emergence of Intrinsic Length Scales
summary: We present a systematic study of temperature-driven nonaffine rearrangements in a model amorphous solid across the full thermodynamic range, from a high-temperature liquid, through supercooled and sub-glass regimes, into deep glassy states.
